abstract.t: This document proposes extensions to IPv6 Neighbor Discovery forIPv6-over-(foo)-over-IPv4 links, where (foo) is either anencapsulating layer (e.g., UDP) or a NULL layer. It is essentially alightweight, link-layer mechanism for neighbors to establish securityassociations, discover and dynamically re-adjust maximum receive unit(MRU) estimates, and perform unreachability detection. The protocolmakes no attempt to ensure reliable message delivery; this functionis performed by higher-layer protocols, e.g. TCP.
